page.title: 01Bramley-population and shops
page.content: Bramley is on the A281 2-3 miles South of Guildford in the county of Surrey. It has a population of 2826. Its nearest neighbour is Wonersh which has a population of 1772. { Shops in Bramley.} There are many shops in Bramley. Here is a list of those shops. 1.Sue Wingate - mainly gifts and stationery. 2.Kay's - newspapers and sweets. 3.Robertson's - Domestic electrical appliances. 4.Clare's Pantry - mini supermarket. 5.Whibley's - green grocers, flowers. 6.Peter Dominic - off licence. 7.Moss - chemist. 8.Eric Hill-dress shop and mail order. 9.Bamfords - Hardware and gardening. 10.Warnes - Green grocers. 11.Jewellers Shop.
